info.name: Get PGs by Owner ID
info.description: Retrieve all PG accommodations owned by a specific user

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves all PG accommodations that are owned by a specific user (owner).

**Endpoint Details:**
- **Method**: GET
- **URL**: `/api/pgs/owner/{ownerId}`
- **Path Parameter**: `ownerId` (Long) - The ID of the owner/user

**Response:**
- **Success (200)**: Returns a list of PG objects owned by the specified user
- **Error (500)**: Returns error message if failed to fetch owner PGs

**Example Response:**
```json
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Sunshine PG",
    "location": "Andheri West",
    "description": "Comfortable PG accommodation",
    "price": 12000,
    "address": "123 Sunshine Street",
    "city": "Mumbai",
    "state": "Maharashtra",
    "amenities": ["WiFi", "AC", "Food"],
    "images": [],
    "rating": 4.5,
    "reviewCount": 25,
    "status": "ACTIVE",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00"
  }
]
```
